objects.description: Leviathan has downloaded additional scripts and files from adversary-controlled servers. (Citation: Proofpoint Leviathan Oct 2017) Leviathan has also used an uploader known as LUNCHMONEY that can exfiltrate files to Dropbox. (Citation: FireEye Periscope March 2018)

external_references.description: Axel F, Pierre T. (2017, October 16). Leviathan: Espionage actor spearphishes maritime and defense targets. Retrieved February 15, 2018.
FireEye. (2018, March 16). Suspected Chinese Cyber Espionage Group (TEMP.Periscope) Targeting U.S. Engineering and Maritime Industries. Retrieved April 11, 2018.
